Tests bad algorithm inputs for AES-CTR

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".



Importing AES-CBC key...

encrypt() with counter null...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: counter: Not a BufferSource

encrypt() without counter...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: counter: Missing required property

encrypt() without length...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: length: Missing required property

encrypt() with a length of 256...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: length: Outside of numeric range

encrypt() with a length of -3...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: length: Outside of numeric range

encrypt() with length that is Infinity...
error is: TypeError: AesCtrParams: length: Outside of numeric range
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
